Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: I would like to get the links for CC Lifecycle and FabToken to reference in the NodeSDK docs

Action.author: joe-alewine
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com What do you mean by "reference"? You want the "What's New" to have links to the SDK docs? Or do you want the links that will be in What's New (for Lifecycle and FabToken) so you can link to them in the SDK docs?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: I just want the links that would be in the "whats new" , but I think it would be good to have a link to the NodeSDK tutorials for the new Lifecycle and FabToken supprt in the "whats new". So the short answer ... both
